backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.

frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based color tokens and light/dark theme variables.

frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query hooks interacting with the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and numerous CSS variables for light/dark themes plus base typography and layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page showing the author's portrait, bio paragraphs, and optional highlights from siteContent.
frontend/src/pages/BooksPage.tsx: Displays a list of books from siteContent with cover images, status badges, blurbs, and optional extended descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section and a featured books section using siteContent and various UI components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, features, and current state for the Jeffrey Butler author website.
